table.name: raw_domestic_epc_certificates_tbl
table.description: Domestic Energy Performance Certificate data from UK government register

column.name: LMK_KEY
column.description: Individual lodgement identifier. Guaranteed to be unique and can be used to identify a certificate in the downloads and the API.

column.name: ADDRESS1
column.description: First line of the address

column.name: ADDRESS2
column.description: Second line of the address

column.name: ADDRESS3
column.description: Third line of the address

column.name: POSTCODE
column.description: The postcode of the property

column.name: BUILDING_REFERENCE_NUMBER
column.description: Unique identifier for the property.

column.name: CURRENT_ENERGY_RATING
column.description: Current energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient)

column.name: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_RATING
column.description: Estimated potential energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient)

column.name: CURRENT_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
column.description: Based on cost of energy, i.e. energy required for space heating, water heating and lighting [in kWh/year] multiplied by fuel costs. (£/m²/year where cost is derived from kWh).

column.name: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
column.description: The potential energy efficiency rating of the property.

column.name: PROPERTY_TYPE
column.description: Describes the type of property such as House, Flat, Maisonette etc. This is the type differentiator for dwellings.

column.name: BUILT_FORM
column.description: The building type of the Property e.g. Detached, Semi-Detached, Terrace etc. Together with the Property Type, the Build Form produces a structured description of the property

column.name: INSPECTION_DATE
column.description: The date that the inspection was actually carried out by the energy assessor

column.name: LOCAL_AUTHORITY
column.description: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Local authority area in which the building is located.

column.name: CONSTITUENCY
column.description: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Parliamentary constituency in which the building is located.

column.name: COUNTY
column.description: County in which the building is located (where applicable)

column.name: LODGEMENT_DATE
column.description: Date lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register

column.name: TRANSACTION_TYPE
column.description: Type of transaction that triggered EPC. For example, one of: marketed sale; non-marketed sale; new-dwelling; rental; not sale or rental; assessment for Green Deal; following Green Deal; FIT application; none of the above; RHI application; ECO assessment. Where the reason for the assessment is unknown by the energy assessor the transaction type will be recorded as 'none of the above'. Transaction types may be changed over time.

column.name: ENVIRONMENTAL_IMPACT_CURRENT
column.description: The Environmental Impact Rating. A measure of the property's current impact on the environment in terms of carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions. The higher the rating the lower the CO₂ emissions. (CO₂ emissions in tonnes / year)

column.name: ENVIRONMENTAL_IMPACT_POTENTIAL
column.description: The potential Environmental Impact Rating. A measure of the property's potential impact on the environment in terms of carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions after improvements have been carried out. The higher the rating the lower the CO₂ emissions. (CO₂ emissions in tonnes / year)

column.name: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_CURRENT
column.description: Current estimated total energy consumption for the property in a 12 month period (kWh/m2). Displayed on EPC as the current primary energy use per square metre of floor area.

column.name: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_POTENTIAL
column.description: Estimated potential total energy consumption for the Property in a 12 month period. Value is Kilowatt Hours per Square Metre (kWh/m²)

column.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_CURRENT
column.description: CO₂ emissions per year in tonnes/year.

column.name: CO2_EMISS_CURR_PER_FLOOR_AREA
column.description: CO₂ emissions per square metre floor area per year in kg/m²

column.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_POTENTIAL
column.description: Estimated value in Tonnes per Year of the total CO₂ emissions produced by the Property in 12 month period.

column.name: LIGHTING_COST_CURRENT
column.description: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for lighting the property.

column.name: LIGHTING_COST_POTENTIAL
column.description: GBP. Potential estimated annual energy costs for lighting the property after improvements have been made.

column.name: HEATING_COST_CURRENT
column.description: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for heating the property.

column.name: HEATING_COST_POTENTIAL
column.description: GBP. Potential annual energy costs for lighting the property after improvements have been made.

column.name: HOT_WATER_COST_CURRENT
column.description: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for hot water

column.name: HOT_WATER_COST_POTENTIAL
column.description: GBP. Potential estimated annual energy costs for hot water after improvements have been made.

column.name: TOTAL_FLOOR_AREA
column.description: The total useful floor area is the total of all enclosed spaces measured to the internal face of the external walls, i.e. the gross floor area as measured in accordance with the guidance issued from time to time by the Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors or by a body replacing that institution. (m²)

column.name: ENERGY_TARIFF
column.description: Type of electricity tariff for the property, e.g. single.

column.name: MAINS_GAS_FLAG
column.description: Whether mains gas is available. Yes means that there is a gas meter or a gas-burning appliance in the dwelling. A closed-off gas pipe does not count.

column.name: FLOOR_LEVEL
column.description: Flats and maisonettes only. Floor level relative to the lowest level of the property (0 for ground floor). If there is a basement, the basement is level 0 and the other floors are from 1 upwards

column.name: FLAT_TOP_STOREY
column.description: Whether the flat is on the top storey

column.name: FLAT_STOREY_COUNT
column.description: The number of storeys in the apartment block.

column.name: MAIN_HEATING_CONTROLS
column.description: Type of main heating controls. Includes both main heating systems if there are two.

column.name: MULTI_GLAZE_PROPORTION
column.description: The estimated banded range (e.g. 0% - 10%) of the total glazed area of the Property that is multiple glazed.

column.name: GLAZED_TYPE
column.description: The type of glazing. From British Fenestration Rating Council or manufacturer declaration, one of; single; double; triple.

column.name: GLAZED_AREA
column.description: Ranged estimate of the total glazed area of the Habitable Area.

column.name: EXTENSION_COUNT
column.description: The number of extensions added to the property. Between 0 and 4.

column.name: NUMBER_HABITABLE_ROOMS
column.description: Habitable rooms include any living room, sitting room, dining room, bedroom, study and similar; and also a non-separated conservatory. A kitchen/diner having a discrete seating area (with space for a table and four chairs) also counts as a habitable room. A non-separated conservatory adds to the habitable room count if it has an internal quality door between it and the dwelling. Excluded from the room count are any room used solely as a kitchen, utility room, bathroom, cloakroom, en-suite accommodation and similar and any hallway, stairs or landing; and also any room not having a window.

column.name: NUMBER_HEATED_ROOMS
column.description: The number of heated rooms in the property if more than half of the habitable rooms are not heated.

column.name: LOW_ENERGY_LIGHTING
column.description: The percentage of low energy lighting present in the property as a percentage of the total fixed lights in the property. 0% indicates that no low-energy lighting is present.

column.name: NUMBER_OPEN_FIREPLACES
column.description: The number of Open Fireplaces in the Property. An Open Fireplace is a fireplace that still allows air to pass between the inside of the Property and the outside.

column.name: HOTWATER_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: HOT_WATER_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: HOT_WATER_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: FLOOR_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: FLOOR_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: FLOOR_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: WINDOWS_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: WINDOWS_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: WINDOWS_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: WALLS_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: WALLS_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: WALLS_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: SECONDHEAT_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: SHEATING_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: SHEATING_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: ROOF_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: ROOF_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: ROOF_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: MAINHEAT_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: MAINHEAT_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: MAINHEAT_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: MAINHEATCONT_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: MAINHEATC_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: MAINHEATC_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: LIGHTING_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Overall description of the property feature

column.name: LIGHTING_ENERGY_EFF
column.description: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: LIGHTING_ENV_EFF
column.description: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

column.name: MAIN_FUEL
column.description: The type of fuel used to power the central heating e.g. Gas, Electricity

column.name: WIND_TURBINE_COUNT
column.description: Number of wind turbines; 0 if none.

column.name: HEAT_LOSS_CORRIDOR
column.description: Flats and maisonettes only. Indicates that the flat contains a corridor through which heat is lost. Heat loss corridor, one of: no corridor; heated corridor; unheated corridor

column.name: UNHEATED_CORRIDOR_LENGTH
column.description: The total length of unheated corridor in the flat. Only populated if flat or maisonette contains unheated corridor. If unheated corridor, length of sheltered wall (m²).

column.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT
column.description: Average height of the storey in metres.

column.name: PHOTO_SUPPLY
column.description: Percentage of photovoltaic area as a percentage of total roof area. 0% indicates that a Photovoltaic Supply is not present in the property.

column.name: SOLAR_WATER_HEATING_FLAG
column.description: Indicates whether the heating in the Property is solar powered.

column.name: MECHANICAL_VENTILATION
column.description: Identifies the type of mechanical ventilation the property has. This is required for the RdSAP calculation.

column.name: ADDRESS
column.description: Field containing the concatenation of address1, address2 and address3. Note that post code is recorded separately.

column.name: LOCAL_AUTHORITY_LABEL
column.description: The name of the local authority area in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Local Authority ONS Code.

column.name: CONSTITUENCY_LABEL
column.description: The name of the parliamentary constituency in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Constituency ONS Code.

column.name: POSTTOWN
column.description: The post town of the property

column.name: LODGEMENT_DATETIME
column.description: Date and time lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register.

column.name: TENURE
column.description: Describes the tenure type of the property. One of: Owner-occupied; Rented (social); Rented (private).

column.name: FIXED_LIGHTING_OUTLETS_COUNT
column.description: The number of fixed lighting outlets.

column.name: LOW_ENERGY_FIXED_LIGHT_COUNT
column.description: The number of low-energy fixed lighting outlets.

column.name: UPRN
column.description: The UPRN submitted by an assessor or alternatively from the department’s address matching algorithm.

column.name: UPRN_SOURCE
column.description: Populated with the values "Energy Assessor" or "Address Matched" to show how the UPRN was populated.

column.name: REPORT_TYPE
column.description: Type of assessment carried out on the building, for domestic dwellings this is either a SAP (Standard Assessment Procedure) or a Reduced SAP. 100: RdSAP (Reduced SAP for existing buildings) and 101: SAP (full Sap for new dwellings, including conversions and change of use). This variable will help distinguish between new and existing dwellings.
